description:
The festival in Shin-Yokohama is overrun with vampires, and a heart-shaped vampire causes trouble.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: L`appel de la fête / Vain combat de vampires à Shin-Yoko / Draluc All Night Shin-Yoko
Matsuribayashi ga Kimi o Yobu / Heisei Meiwaku na Kyuuketsuki Kassen Shin`yoko / Draluc no All Night Shin`yoko
The Festival Music Calls You / Heisei Annoying Vampire Battle in Shin-Yoko / Draluc`s All Night Shin-Yoko
祭り囃子が君を呼ぶ / 平成迷惑な吸血鬼合戦シンヨコ / ドラルクのオールナイト・シンヨコ
